host.description: The hostname. This component is not percent-encoded. The hostname can contain `#{host}`. Defaults to `#{host}`.

path.description: The absolute path, starting with the leading "/". This component is not percent-encoded. The path can contain #{host}, #{path}, and #{port}. Defaults to `/#{path}`.

port.description: The port. Specify a value from `1` to `65535` or `#{port}`. Defaults to `#{port}`.

protocol.description: The protocol. Valid values are `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, or `#{protocol}`. Defaults to `#{protocol}`.

query.description: The query parameters, URL-encoded when necessary, but not percent-encoded. Do not include the leading "?". Defaults to `#{query}`.

statusCode.description: The HTTP redirect code. The redirect is either permanent (`HTTP_301`) or temporary (`HTTP_302`).
